Freder Fredersen.action: Tanner (Freder) takes a deep breath, walks confidently onto the catwalk, and assumes the attitude of someone who belongs there.
Freder Fredersen.assessment: This shows Freder's ability to control his demeanor and project confidence in a high-risk environment, indicating social and situational competence.

Freder Fredersen.action: Tanner opens a program panel and types commands, using an access card to hack into the system and gain waiter credentials.
Freder Fredersen.assessment: This demonstrates technical skill, quick thinking, and resourcefulness, reflecting a high level of competence in navigating complex systems.

Freder Fredersen.action: Tanner manages to avoid detection by Dex by turning his face away and hiding his expression while the program scans his body type.
Freder Fredersen.assessment: This indicates tactical awareness and self-control under pressure, further supporting his competence in stealth and deception.

Freder Fredersen.action: When Dex grabs Tanner's shoulder, Tanner tenses and reaches for his laser but quickly complies when Dex shows the open program panel.
Freder Fredersen.assessment: This shows Freder's readiness to respond to threats but also his ability to quickly assess the situation and avoid unnecessary conflict, reflecting prudent judgment.
